description: Valid search with all required parameters returns flight offers
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LAX, destination=NYC, departureDate=2024-12-01, returnDate=2024-12-08
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 200 response
Validate response contains at least one flight offer
expected_result: Response contains list of flight offers with price, airline, and flight times

description: One-way trip search with valid parameters
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LHR, destination=CDG, departureDate=2024-11-15, omit returnDate
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 200 response
Validate response contains outbound flights only

description: Search with IATA city codes instead of airport codes
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=NYC (city code), destination=LON (city code), departureDate=2024-12-01
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 200 response
Validate response includes flights from multiple airports in the cities
expected_result: Response contains flights from all airports in the specified cities

test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with destination=JFK, departureDate=2024-12-01, omit origin
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response
Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LAX, departureDate=2024-12-01, omit destination
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response

description: Missing departure date parameter returns error
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LAX, destination=NYC, omit departureDate
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response
Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LAX, destination=NYC, departureDate=01-12-2024 (DD-MM-YYYY format)
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response
expected_result: Error message indicates 'invalid date format, use YYYY-MM-DD'

description: Past departure date returns no flights
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LAX, destination=NYC, departureDate=2020-01-01
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 200 response
Validate response contains empty flight offers list
expected_result: Response contains empty flight offers array

description: Invalid IATA code format returns error
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LOSANGELES, destination=NEWYORK, departureDate=2024-12-01
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response
expected_result: Error message indicates 'invalid IATA code format'

description: Return date before departure date returns error
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LAX, destination=NYC, departureDate=2024-12-08, returnDate=2024-12-01
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response
expected_result: Error message indicates 'returnDate must be after departureDate'

description: Search with special characters in city names returns error
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=L@X, destination=NYC, departureDate=2024-12-01
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response
expected_result: Error message indicates 'invalid characters in origin'

description: Response includes all required fields for each flight offer
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=SFO, destination=BOS, departureDate=2024-12-15
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 200 response
For each flight offer, verify presence of price, airline, departureTime, arrivalTime
expected_result: Every flight offer contains price, airline, and flight times

description: Search with numeric IATA codes returns error
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=123, destination=456, departureDate=2024-12-01
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response
expected_result: Error message indicates 'invalid IATA code format'

description: Case insensitive IATA codes are accepted
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=lax, destination=nyc, departureDate=2024-12-01
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 200 response
Validate response contains flight offers
expected_result: Response contains flight offers regardless of case

description: Search with same origin and destination returns error
test_steps: Prepare AirShoppingRQ payload with origin=LAX, destination=LAX, departureDate=2024-12-01
Send POST request to AirShoppingRQ endpoint
Verify HTTP 400 response
expected_result: Error message indicates 'origin and destination cannot be the same'
